verbs.description: [ARG1: island] - [V: hopping] [ARG0: conor knighton] travels to the isolated speck of land off the coast of africa where residents of the british - controlled island maintain ties to the homeland 4 500 miles away atlantic ocean governor lisa honan conor knighton aaron legg st helena saints giselle richards longwood house rms st helena napoleon
